name: Empowered State
description:
# Description

Empowered state is a third person tower defense game about collecting crystals on an alien planet so you can fuel up your spaceship and leave. In the process you get attacked by flying space rabbits who figured out that stealing your crystals is easier than mining their own. The more crystals you have, the more rabbits come take them.
The game would need some more work, but that's how far we could get it in 3 days.

# Instructions
WASD - move

1, 2, 3 - select turret type to place

**In placement mode:**

left click - place turret

right click - cancel placement

# Turret descriptions:
**Slot 1 - Miner - 5 crystals**

Mines for crystals. Produces 1 crystal per 10 seconds when placed on a crystal or 1 crystal per 45 seconds if not placed on a crystal.

**Slot 2 - Sentry - 15 crystals**

Shoots any rabbits that come into range and then has 20 seconds long cooldown period.

**Slot 3 - Bear Trap - 4  crystals**

Lies on the ground until it detects a rabbit. Then it flies up into the sky and strikes from the above.
